poderdetect module¶

Hidden Target and aperture detection

poderdetect.get_apeture_centroids(image, binary, num_of_balls)¶

Calculate the locations of all the mlc defined aperture positions.

The location will be returned as the coordinates of the centre of mass of the aperture.

Parameters

  • image (numpy array) – image within which to find the mlc apertures.

  • binary (boolean array) – boolean mask for epid image to only include apetures

Returns

centroids – list of apertures found in increasing y coordingates.

Return type

list of tuples

poderdetect.get_ball_positions(image, binary, num_of_balls)¶

Return the positions of all the balls found in the image.

This function is used by the funtions get_drr_balls and get_epid_balls.

Parameters

sel (numy_array of binarised imaged) – DESCRIPTION.

Returns

ball_positions – DESCRIPTION.

Return type

TYPE

poderdetect.get_drr_apertures(names, mlcfolder, num_of_balls, cropx, cropy, df)¶

Get aperture positions from the mlc image and saves to dataframe.

Parameters

  • names (list of strings) – contains the names of tif image files.

  • num_of_balls (integer) – how many balls do you have?

Returns

Return type

None.

poderdetect.get_drr_balls(names, drrfolder, num_of_balls, cropx, cropy, df)¶

Get the ball positions from the drr image.

Parameters

files (list of strings) – contains the names of tif image files.

Returns

Return type

None.

poderdetect.get_epid_balls_and_apertures(names, epidfolder, num_of_balls, cropx, cropy, df)¶

Get the ball and apeture positions from the EPID image.

Parameters

files (list of strings) – contains the names of tif image files.

Returns

Return type

None.

poderdetect.sparse_image(img, cropx, cropy)¶

Crop the imge and make it sparse.

Parameters

  • img (numpy array) – image to make sparse.

  • cropx (int) – number pixels in the y direction.

  • cropy (int) – numnber of pixels in the x direction.

Returns

DESCRIPTION.

Return type

TYPE
